elements.name: Module
elements.description: Wrapper element to help split up large configuration files into smaller valid XML files. It may be used as root tag when an XML file contains multiple adapters and/or jobs. The Module element itself does not influence the behavior of Frank configurations.

elements.name: Start
elements.description: Description of Start. Value of VARIABLE is variable value. Value of TheEnum.ENUM_CONSTANT is enum constant.
